meta.description: 查找 Pokémon GO 火箭隊的剋星。使用世界第一準確的自訂火箭隊剋星指南，取得前 30 名剋星。

title: 火箭隊打手
intro: 火箭隊已經入侵Pokemon Go，Pokebattler可以幫助你擊敗他們！戰鬥將通過3v3的模式在你和火箭隊強化過的寶可夢間進行。戰鬥可能會極其艱苦請在挑戰前做好準備！

note.default: 一般打手不會太難，因為他們不會使用護盾。幹部與坂木老大數值更高，且會擋下你前兩發大招。抵抗小招並使用能逼出影子寶可夢護盾的寶可夢，是擊敗他們的關鍵！
note.loggedIn: 注意：請確認你的訓練家等級設定正確。火箭隊數值的實作機制仍在研究中，但玩家等級會影響戰鬥結果。火箭隊寶可夢已經不像以前那麼強，請重新檢視你的自訂剋星

articles.title: 最新的火箭隊消息！
articles.subtitle: 來自頂級玩家和研究者的關於火箭隊的文章和視頻

RAID_LEVEL_1.title: 一星火箭隊
RAID_LEVEL_1.subtitle: 常見暗影對戰
RAID_LEVEL_1.intro: 一星火箭隊對戰比較簡單，任何人選擇正確的打手應該都能擊敗。對於40級的玩家而言對手是增強過的27級寶可夢。低等級的玩家會面對更簡單的寶可夢

RAID_LEVEL_1_LEGACY.title: 一星火箭隊(已下架)
RAID_LEVEL_1_LEGACY.subtitle: 常見暗影對戰
RAID_LEVEL_1_LEGACY.intro: These battles are not currently in the team GO Rocket rotations.

RAID_LEVEL_2.title: 二星火箭隊
RAID_LEVEL_2.subtitle: 稀有暗影對戰
RAID_LEVEL_2.intro: 二星火箭隊對戰有一些難度，任何人選用正確的強化過的打手該都能擊敗。對於40級的玩家而言對手是增強過的30級寶可夢。低等級的玩家會面對更簡單的寶可夢

RAID_LEVEL_3.title: 三星火箭隊
RAID_LEVEL_3.subtitle: 傳說暗影對戰
RAID_LEVEL_3.intro: 三星火箭隊對戰尚未推出

RAID_LEVEL_6.subtitle: 高難度幻獸暗影對戰
RAID_LEVEL_6.intro: 三星火箭隊對戰尚未推出

RAID_LEVEL_UNSET.title: ？星火箭隊
RAID_LEVEL_UNSET.subtitle: 未知暗影對戰
RAID_LEVEL_UNSET.intro: These Shadow Pokemon will be parts of future Team GO Rocket invastions. Use this if a new invasion has come out and the site has not been updated yet. You can also use this section for analysis of what would happen if you had a legendary Shadow Squirtle Team GO Rocket invasion too!

RAID_LEVEL_6_LEGACY.title: 六星級傳說頭目
RAID_LEVEL_6_LEGACY.subtitle: 高難度幻獸暗影對戰
RAID_LEVEL_6_LEGACY.intro: 這些戰鬥暫時不在當前的火箭隊輪轉陣容中

CHARACTER_EXECUTIVE_CLIFF.title: 幹部 克里夫
CHARACTER_EXECUTIVE_CLIFF.subtitle: Team GO Rocket Leader
CHARACTER_EXECUTIVE_CLIFF.intro: My strength comes from my loyalty to Team GO Rocket.
CHARACTER_EXECUTIVE_CLIFF.intro2: I will do anything and everything for Team GO Rocket.
CHARACTER_EXECUTIVE_CLIFF.intro3: I owe the boss my life. I’d do anything for him.
CHARACTER_EXECUTIVE_CLIFF.intro4: Team GO Rocket saved me. It’s time to return the favor!
CHARACTER_EXECUTIVE_CLIFF.intro5: Add my name to your list of weaknesses.

CHARACTER_EXECUTIVE_SIERRA.title: 幹部 希爾拉
CHARACTER_EXECUTIVE_SIERRA.subtitle: Team GO Rocket Leader
CHARACTER_EXECUTIVE_SIERRA.intro: I envy you—you get to battle me!
CHARACTER_EXECUTIVE_SIERRA.intro2: This will be a battle I’m sure you’ll never forget.
CHARACTER_EXECUTIVE_SIERRA.intro3: You already know this, but you don’t stand a chance.
CHARACTER_EXECUTIVE_SIERRA.intro4: You can’t possibly match my skill, dear.
CHARACTER_EXECUTIVE_SIERRA.intro5: I do hope you like the taste of failure!

CHARACTER_EXECUTIVE_ARLO.title: 幹部 亞洛
CHARACTER_EXECUTIVE_ARLO.subtitle: Team GO Rocket Leader
CHARACTER_EXECUTIVE_ARLO.intro: It’s time to learn your place in the world.
CHARACTER_EXECUTIVE_ARLO.intro3: Prepare yourself for a world of hurt.
CHARACTER_EXECUTIVE_ARLO.intro5: Your defeat comes on swift wings.

CHARACTER_GIOVANNI.title: Giovanni
CHARACTER_GIOVANNI.subtitle: The Boss
CHARACTER_GIOVANNI.intro: I will not tolerate your interference.
CHARACTER_GIOVANNI.intro2: You cannot stop me...but I’m amused by your attempt.
CHARACTER_GIOVANNI.intro3: Your professor has not prepared you for what is to come.
CHARACTER_GIOVANNI.intro4: You’ve made it this far. Let me see just how strong you are.
CHARACTER_GIOVANNI.intro5: You will never defeat Team GO Rocket.

CHARACTER_GRUNTB_MALE.title: James
CHARACTER_GRUNTB_MALE.subtitle: Team GO Rocket Balloon
CHARACTER_GRUNTB_MALE.intro: To unite all people within our nation!
CHARACTER_GRUNTB_MALE.intro2: To extend our reach to the stars above!
CHARACTER_GRUNTB_MALE.intro3: Hey, would you like to join Team Rocket?
CHARACTER_GRUNTB_MALE.intro5: Surrender now, or prepare to fight!

CHARACTER_GRUNTB_FEMALE.title: Jessie
CHARACTER_GRUNTB_FEMALE.subtitle: Team GO Rocket Balloon
CHARACTER_GRUNTB_FEMALE.intro: To protect the world from devastation!
CHARACTER_GRUNTB_FEMALE.intro2: To denounce the evils of truth and love!
CHARACTER_GRUNTB_FEMALE.intro3: Hey, do you want to join Team Rocket?
CHARACTER_GRUNTB_FEMALE.intro4: The Boss's Persian is so elegant...
CHARACTER_GRUNTB_FEMALE.intro5: Who are these Team GO Rocket Leaders, anyway?

CHARACTER_FIGHTING_GRUNT_FEMALE.intro: This buff physique isn't just for show!

results.title: {{defender}} 打手

meta.description: 最佳 Team GO Rocket {{defender}} 剋星，支援等級與護盾設定

counters.title: 剋星
counters.subtitle: 排名順序依照
counters.description: 以下分析顯示在 {{sort}} 指標上，對 {{pokemon}} 最強的剋星。
counters.moveSetOrderingDescription: 配招由最難打到最容易排序。請務必檢查多個配招，結果可能差異很大！
counters.difficultyNote: 火箭隊入侵的影子寶可夢比一般對戰難度更高，你應仔細評估選擇。

hardestMovesets.title: 最困難的對戰
hardestMovesets.subtitle: {{pokemon}}頭目的難打程度(依{{sort}}排序)
hardestMovesets.description: 火箭隊對戰的難度會因防守方招式組而大幅改變！

analysis.title: 關於此分析
analysis.description: 此火箭隊對戰分析是以 {{defender.cp}} CP 的 {{defender.pokemon}} 作為防守方，並搭配 {{attackers}} 進行模擬而得。模擬是使用火箭隊入侵模擬器執行。針對 {{defender.pokemon}} 的每種可能招式，都與所有寶可夢在每種可能招式組合下對戰，共執行 {{numSims}} 次模擬。依 {{sort}} 指標保留最佳 30 名攻擊者與其最佳招式組，並在此顯示。

attackers.pokebox: #{{userId}}的寶可夢盒子中的定制化寶可夢

patreon.description: 訂閱者的支持讓我們得以提供更準確的針對未知技能組合的模擬結果。訂閱者可以獲得額外的寶可夢盒空間，更加準確的模擬結果等多項特權。
patreon.link: 查看注冊可以獲得的所有獎勵

results.description: Welcome to the Pokebattler Team GO Rocket counters guide for {{pokemon}}. You can find the best counters based on the moveset of each shadow Pokemon. This guide is customizable in several different ways. You can log in and enter your Pokemon into your Pokebox for the highest accuracy result as view these general results using various sort options.

executives.title: Team GO Rocket Leaders
executives.description: Team GO Rocket leaders feature more difficult fights including shielding! Make sure you are prepared for all Team GO Rocket has in store for you!

grunts.title: Team GO Rocket Grunts
grunts.description: Team GO Rocket grunts are easier fights with no shields.
